alert.note: Alert for Claiborne; Franklin; Jefferson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 22 at 2:14PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Claiborne, Jefferson and Franklin Counties through 300 PM CDT... At 213 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Church Hill to near Kirby. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Fayette around 225 PM CDT. Bude around 230 PM CDT. New Hope and Lorman around 240 PM CDT. Red Lick around 245 PM CDT. Mccall Creek around 250 PM CDT. Port Gibson and Blue Hill around 255 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Roxie and Meadville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
